description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in birtviewer.query in IBM TRIRIGA Application Platform 3.2 and 3.3 before 3.3.0.2, 3.3.1 before 3.3.1.3, 3.3.2 before 3.3.2.2, and 3.4 before 3.4.0.1 allows remote authenticated users to hijack the authentication of arbitrary users for requests that insert XSS sequences.
